definition: to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: Chlamydia screening is recommended for all pregnant women.
sentences.chinese: 所有孕婦有必要行衣原體篩查。

sentences.english: The systematic application of a screening test in an asymptomatic population.
sentences.chinese: 在無症狀的人羣中有條理地應用篩查檢測。

sentences.english: Keeping up-to-date on cancer screening tests saves lives.
sentences.chinese: 及時跟進新的癌症篩查檢測可以挽救健康和生命。

sentences.english: US blood banks are screened for the virus
sentences.chinese: 美國血站開始篩查艾滋病毒。

sentences.english: Objective: To using umbilical blood detect the thalassemia to neonate.
sentences.chinese: 目的應用臍血對新生兒進行地中海貧血的篩查。

sentences.english: I generally don't recommend routine screening tests looking for coronary artery disease.
sentences.chinese: 一般我不建議用例行篩查試驗來尋找冠狀動脈疾病。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the significance of glucose challenge test in the prevention and treatment of fetal macrosomia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討糖篩查在巨大胎兒防治中的價值。

sentences.english: Paper Province Jiangmen prevention work in rural areas in rapid screening for syphilis.
sentences.chinese: 省皮防工作人員在江門農村地區進行梅毒快速篩查。

sentences.english: Neonatal TSH screening may be a more sensitive index for monitoring IDD.
sentences.chinese: 新生兒TSH篩查是監測碘缺乏病的更敏感指標。

sentences.english: Conclusion:Screening the Down's syndrome ought to be proceed to each gravida.
sentences.chinese: 結論每位孕婦都應進行“唐氏兒”篩查。

sentences.english: Follow-up colorectal cancer screening is recommended in 5 years forroutine colon cancer screening.
sentences.chinese: 建議在5年內做一次後續的結腸癌篩查。

sentences.english: Consult your doctor for regular cancer screenings.
sentences.chinese: 向醫生諮詢你的癌症篩查結果。

sentences.english: Group for Newborn Screening, Society of Child Health, Chinese Preventive Medicine Association.
sentences.chinese: 中華預防醫學會兒童保健分會新生兒疾病篩查學組。

sentences.english: So there is no single accepted screening platform.
sentences.chinese: 因此不存在被人們接受的篩查平臺。

sentences.english: Conclusion Color echocardiography can be used routinely in diagnosis of congenital heart disease of cyanotic neonates.
sentences.chinese: 結論彩超可作爲青紫新生兒先心病的常規篩查手段。

sentences.english: Insurers would now be required to pay for obesity screening and counseling.
sentences.chinese: 現在，保險公司需要支付肥胖篩查和諮詢的費用。

definition: employee/person employed in a trade or profession
to refer sb to an agency (or hospital etc)/referral
